title: Westwood Top Floor 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Penthouse Apt in the Best Location
posting_body: Top Floor 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Penthouse Westwood Apartment.
If you're looking for a new place to call home, we have the apartment for you.
You'll love living in this beautiful one bedroom apartment located in the heart of Westwood.

In this newer building we offer laminate hardwood floor in the living room, plush carpeting in the bedroom, granite counter tops, oak cabinetry with a built-in china cabinet, central air and heat, built-in microwave and dishwasher, gas oven and cook top, balcony, as well as high-end contemporary finishes throughout the apartment.
Enjoy our roof-top deck with magnificent views all the way to the ocean!
After cooking it up on the barbecue and getting some sun in the lounge chairs, relax in the jacuzzi or sauna that will make the stress of your day disappear!
We're located minutes from UCLA and the quaint Westwood Village.
We are especially proud of this luxury building.
This building is owned and managed by loving and private owners, and we pride ourselves in taking care of all your needs in a timely and professional manner.
Call us to set up an appointment at
For more information and photos for our property, visit <URL>
Designed and developed from the ground up by Rockdyne Enterprises, each of our residences has high-end contemporary finishes throughout the apartment and additionally offers:
The building amenities include the following features:
Roof Top Deck With Ocean To City Views
Roof Top Barbecue And Lounge Area
Additional Storage Spaces Available To All Residents
Surveillance Cameras In Most Common Areas
Central Courtyard With Magnificent Sculpture By World-Renowned Artist
Stunning Building Design Commissioned By Award-Winning Architect
